players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Stay cautious, as there may be more enemies among us."
You: "Let's work together to figure out who the mafioso is. We can't trust Charlie, he just confessed to killing Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Stay cautious, as there may be more enemies among us."
Alice: "Let's work together to figure out who the mafioso is. We can't trust Charlie, he just confessed to killing Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
